root.name: Neves
root.description: Gameplay Neves is a puzzle game containing more than 500 tangram puzzles. Tangram puzzles invovle moving, rotating and flipping wooden (in this case, virtual) shapes to fit a pre-determined silhouette. Neves allows you to do this using the Nintendo DS touchscreen. The game features seven different shaped puzzle pieces to utilise (the name Neves, spells 'seven' backwards). Neves has three modes of play. Players can try the puzzles with a timer, without a timer, or with a special restriction in place, meaning players can only make seven moves. Multiplayer Neves features a barebones multiplater mode. Players can beam a puzzle to a friend's DS and then compete to see who can solve the tangram in the fastest time.
